Package com.percussion.extensions.translations

Class Summary
PSFormatDate Takes a date string and transforms it to a new string using a supplied format.
PSFormDecode Will turn a <div> tag that has a special attribute marker to indicate it is actually a form, back into the form tag.
PSFormEncode Will turn a <form> tag into a <div> tag that has a special attribute marker to indicate it is actually a form.
PSFormEncodeDecodeHelper Helper class to handle the encoding and decoding of HTML form tag elements to and from a div tag marker used to represent the form tag.
PSJexlInputTranslation Evaluate a JEXL expression for input.
PSMapInputValue Map an input value using a map of name value pairs.
PSMapOutputValue Map an input value using a map of name value pairs.
PSNormalizeDate Parses a date string using a specified format and transforms it to a new string.
PSTranslationTest  
PSTrimStringValue Evaluate a JEXL expression for input.
